headline: Panel Suggests Shrinking the Brooklyn-Queens Expressway
abstract: The proposal to shrink the Brooklyn-Queens Expressway is the latest effort to reduce congestion that is strangling the city.
lead_paragraph: As worsening traffic has put a stranglehold on New York, the countryâ€™s largest city, it has moved to squeeze out cars, taking away street space to make room for bikes and pedestrians, and all but banning vehicles from a major Manhattan thoroughfare.
